intro: Display the intro prompt with program information to the terminal.
commands: Display a list of all available commands to the terminal/console.
clear: Clear the terminal/console of any accumulated output.
exit: Clear the terminal/console and exit the program.
formats-help: Display a list of available file formats for time recording.
filename-set: Set the name of the file where the output will be stored.
preferences: Set user-preferences (location of saved files, prompts, etc)
